title: It's Time For a Change...
description: SPONSORS: Shop VIP-SCDKey OEM Windows 10 Pro keys for $16 and use code 'SKGS' for a 25% discount:   I've been using the same editing rig for a good while... but it isn't been without its fair share of issues! I think it's time for a change - something COMPLETELY different. Let's see how this goes!   Consider supporting us on Patreon!    PC parts list: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X:  NZXT N7 B650e:  64GB Corsair Vengeance DDR5:  (x2) AMD Radeon RX 7900XTX:  Lian Li 205 Mesh C:  2TB Corsair MP600 PRO XT:  be quiet! Dark Power Pro 13:  2TB Crucial MX500:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony A7C (Primary):  Sony a6600 (Secondary):  Sony a6400 (Webcam):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:    Channel music provided by Monstercat:   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.
